title: [Bug]: Electron CLI flags give blank window
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

config.json electronCLIFlags doesn't work

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.13.1

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Instruction: https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/blob/main/app/config/README.md#electron-cli-flags

1. Set `electronCLIFlags` in `config.json`:

{
	"electronCLIFlags": [ ["ozone-platform","wayland"] ],
	"disableNotificationSound": true
}

2. Run `/opt/teams-for-linux/teams-for-linux`.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Set `electronCLIFlags`.
2. Run `teams-for-linux`.
3. App is running under Wayland
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```
```
/opt/teams-for-linux/teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'                                                                                 ✔ 
all good with appLogLevels you aren't using them
Initialising logger with config: "{}"

}
```

### Additional context
